properties.name: Webex Suspicious File Bot Access Token
properties.description: The Webex Bot Access Token

properties.name: Crowdstrike Detects Use Time Horizon
properties.description: Toggle to use Time Horizon or simple limit

properties.name: Webex Suspicious File Bot Room Name
properties.description: The Webex Bot Room Name to post the notification to.

This workflow retrieves Crowdstrike Detects in a configurable time horizon (10 minutes by default) and investigate each one to get a final verdict.

A Webex Teams message is posted to notify an administrator with the investigation details about each verdict and a TheHive case is opened for Malicious, Suspicious and Unknown verdicts to take further action.

Targets used:  HHC Crowdstrike API, Cisco Threat Response API, TheHive API, Webex Teams API

Steps:
[] Get Crowdstrike Detects in configurable time horizon.
[] Investigate each Detect.
[] Determine a final verdict for each Detect
[] Post a Webex Teams message with investigation details for each Detect.
[] Open a TheHive case for each Detect if the final verdict is Malicious, Suspicious or Unknown.

actions.name: Condition Block
actions.title: Retrieve Crowdstrike Detects on Time Horizon or Limit?

properties.display_name: Retrieve Crowdstrike Detects on Time Horizon or Limit?

properties.script:
import sys
from datetime import datetime, timezone, timedelta

detects_horizon_minutes = int(sys.argv[1])

horizon_end = datetime.utcnow()
delta = timedelta(minutes=int(detects_horizon_minutes))
horizon_begin = horizon_end - delta

horizon_begin_str = f'{horizon_begin.isoformat()}Z'
horizon_end_str = f'{horizon_end.isoformat()}Z'

properties.script:
import sys

verdict, created_timestamp, detect_id, device_id, hostname, \
  os_version, local_ip, external_ip = sys.argv[1:]

# verdict = '$workflow.definition_workflow_01S7JPWVFNNJY2Ih5Eoqty5LKwGLHTzGyVY.local.variable_workflow_01S86P0S9S4IR7SpH8asIcNBQsIJFETQPdK$'
# created_timestamp = '$activity.definition_activity_01S7K4VC0W41F7BMtX4gGavueEdp34bJqNP.input.source_array[@].created_timestamp$'
# detect_id = '$activity.definition_activity_01S7K4VC0W41F7BMtX4gGavueEdp34bJqNP.input.source_array[@].detection_id$'
# device_id = '$activity.definition_activity_01S7K20475HS92IEzUy3tVEmXAB7CNfMps5.output.jsonpath_queries.device_id$'
# hostname = '$activity.definition_activity_01S7K20475HS92IEzUy3tVEmXAB7CNfMps5.output.jsonpath_queries.hostname$'
# os_version = '$activity.definition_activity_01S7K20475HS92IEzUy3tVEmXAB7CNfMps5.output.jsonpath_queries.os_version$'
# local_ip = '$activity.definition_activity_01S7K20475HS92IEzUy3tVEmXAB7CNfMps5.output.jsonpath_queries.local_ip$'
# external_ip = '$activity.definition_activity_01S7K20475HS92IEzUy3tVEmXAB7CNfMps5.output.jsonpath_queries.external_ip$'

webex_formatted_message = f'''$workflow.definition_workflow_01S7JPWVFNNJY2Ih5Eoqty5LKwGLHTzGyVY.local.variable_workflow_01S8C7JU7GTQC3q9cSN3REuP3984IYdUgKs$'''

verdict = '$workflow.definition_workflow_01S7JPWVFNNJY2Ih5Eoqty5LKwGLHTzGyVY.local.variable_workflow_01S86P0S9S4IR7SpH8asIcNBQsIJFETQPdK$'
created_timestamp = '$activity.definition_activity_01S7K4VC0W41F7BMtX4gGavueEdp34bJqNP.input.source_array[@].created_timestamp$'
detect_id = '$activity.definition_activity_01S7K4VC0W41F7BMtX4gGavueEdp34bJqNP.input.source_array[@].detection_id$'
device_id = '$activity.definition_activity_01S7K20475HS92IEzUy3tVEmXAB7CNfMps5.output.jsonpath_queries.device_id$'
hostname = '$activity.definition_activity_01S7K20475HS92IEzUy3tVEmXAB7CNfMps5.output.jsonpath_queries.hostname$'
os_version = '$activity.definition_activity_01S7K20475HS92IEzUy3tVEmXAB7CNfMps5.output.jsonpath_queries.os_version$'
local_ip = '$activity.definition_activity_01S7K20475HS92IEzUy3tVEmXAB7CNfMps5.output.jsonpath_queries.local_ip$'
external_ip = '$activity.definition_activity_01S7K20475HS92IEzUy3tVEmXAB7CNfMps5.output.jsonpath_queries.external_ip$'

thehive_formatted_message = f'''$workflow.definition_workflow_01S7JPWVFNNJY2Ih5Eoqty5LKwGLHTzGyVY.local.variable_workflow_01S8CNZ4MA4CX72vvtAXA8PFIxHJTjVSDNm$'''
